name: DATroniC Data Recording
summary: Learn about .DTR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Data from a DTR file may also be imported into a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet.

description: Contains automobile data recorded by a DATroniC data logging device; used for the calibration and measurement of automotive electronic control units (ECUs); can be analyzed using PC data analysis software.
